quality.title: Quality Expert
quality.summary:
With more than 15 years of experience in software engineering and quality management, I combine a solid technical background with strong expertise in regulated environments, particularly in the medical device industry.

I started my career as a software developer and architect (Java, Node.js, React, Spring Boot) before specializing as a Quality Expert in projects requiring strict compliance (ISO 13485, MDR, ISO 14971, ITIL, GDPR).

This hybrid journey enables me to act as a strategic partner for organizations seeking to structure, optimize, and digitalize their quality processes, or to develop applications in a regulated environment.

- Quality & Compliance: Implementation and optimization of QMS aligned with ISO 13485, MDR, ISO 12207, ITIL, GDPR
- Software Engineering: Java, Spring Boot, Node.js, React, SQL, CI/CD, DevSecOps
- Leadership & Change: Team coordination, training, coaching, change management, KPI-driven improvement
- Tools & Automation: Jira, Confluence, GitLab, Jenkins, SonarQube, Docker, PowerBI

I stand out by my ability to bridge the gap between regulatory requirements and technical realities, ensuring projects that are compliant, efficient, and innovative. My goal: enable companies to deliver safe, high-quality, and sustainable digital solutions.

experience.description: Application Lifecycle Management (ALM) with ISO 12207 - Analysis of the standard and identification of actions to be implemented - Project: Participation in setting up a development factory and CI/CD chain implementation at the SPW - SonarQube: Implementation of the tool in conjunction with the MoE project's DevSecOps team and developers teams

Medical Device Project management - Quality Management System implementation under Medical Device Directive (93/42/EEC) and Medical Device Regulatory (EU) 2017/745 - SaMD: Technical files consolidation - Certification ISO 13485 - Training Management - Records management - Authority and Notify body communication - ISO 13485 Quality Management System connection with ISO9001 and ISO27001 - Quality Management System connection with ITIL 4 practices - GDPR Project management + GDPR connection with ISO27001
Release software management - Test automation strategy and implementation - Quality Software management (Quality Assurance, Control, Managemnet) - Downtime management of IT System - Team management

Product management & Architect for a web-based healthcare application: Electronic Patient Record (EPR) - Saas Solution for Portail Patient Application - Set of teams coordinator and Team management - Incident consultant and helpdesk management
